'true' as QUERYID,
from CLIENT_REVIEW_RECORD
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CLIENT_REVIEW_RECORD (ID, DOC_ID, TITLE, CLIENT_NAME, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_USER, REVIEW_NAME, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_OPERATOR, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME, RECORD_ID, CREATED_DATETIME, WORK_PHONE, PHONE, SECURITY_LEVEL, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL, URGENCY_LEVEL, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON, SALE_PERSON, REVIEW_TERM, REVIEW_PROCESS_TYPE, SPECIAL_MENTIONED_CUSTOMER, VERSION, NO_MORE_REVIEW, ACCOUNTING_FIRM_NAME, SUPPLEMENTARY_MATERIALS_TIME, SUPPLEMENTARY_MATERIALS, REACH_TO_03_DATETIME, SERIAL_NUMBER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewTerm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewProcessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialMentionedCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noMoreReview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountingFirmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplementaryMaterialsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplementaryMaterials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reachTo03Datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update CLIENT_REVIEW_RECORD
DOC_ID = #{s.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{s.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where record_id = #{w,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
